name: places/ChIJGU9-QElZwokR3CEESspsmDY
adrFormatAddress: 30 5th Ave, New York, NY 10011, USA

originalText.text:
I highly recommend Barbara Abruzzo from Living Well Care Navigation to help will all aspects of navigating  the health care system for your loved one or your self.

I first hired Barbara to help me when my Dad went into cardiac arrest and needed immediate heart surgery to save his life. From the moment we put Dad into the ambulance and through the next year Barbara's help in securing the right Doctors,
the right Therapy, and all the right movements across the broad spectrum of care was such a life saver for our family. Her directions were clear, easy to follow, and created a road map for us to follow so we could concentrate on the deep healing process for my Dad.

When my Nice, who is 16 years old, was in excruciating pain and her surgeons were minimizing  her concerns I immediately  reached out to Barbara for help. My Niece  immediately felt at ease with Barbara's advice and loving nature. She felt cared for and seen for the first time since her spinal surgery.

Barbara researched and identified  pediatric spinal surgeons from both HSS and John Hopkins in Florida to get second options on her surgery. She also found a great Physical Therapist with expertise in the Schroth Method for Scoilossis and also recommended the higher dose infer-red full body heating mat the has given her so much pain relief.

Barbaras deep knowledge about the health care industry, Doctors with the best credentials, and how to navigate the complicated web of specialists and options available was priceless for getting my Niece on the right track to healing and recovery.

Her ability to relate to a 16 year old girl with spinal fusion and in her tumultuous teen years was second to none. Her deep caring, expertise, and knowledge all came together to help us get the right help at the right time. I can not say enough how much time and effort Barbara saved us in making the right choices for her health care. Overall, she did it with such easy, respect, caring and so much empathy.

originalText.text: Barbara has and continues to go above and beyond to help my wife and daughter who both have a rare genetic mutation that burdens them with several chronic ailments. Barbara is not only very intelligent and experienced, she also really takes the time to listen, do additional research, and follows up with helpful plans of care. After losing hope with some supposedly prestigious doctors and health care systems over the years, Barbara has restored my faith in getting  help for them. I just wish we found her sooner!
